thread.title: Surface Phone, is that you? Another foldable mobile device patent emerges from Microsoft
thread.title_full: Surface Phone, is that you? Another foldable mobile device patent emerges from Microsoft

author: Jez Corden
title: Surface Phone, is that you? Another foldable mobile device patent emerges from Microsoft
text:
Another folding phone patent has appeared, complimenting earlier designs published by Microsoft earlier in the year.
Microsoft watcher h0x0d unearthed the patent this morning, which shows a center-folding configuration, not unlike the ill-fated Microsoft Courier device of yesteryear.
